short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts you to referral rewards from friends & others while shopping

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** Ultimate Referral Reminder **

ReferralCodes is the largest referral community, helping you earn rewards from over 7,500 stores! (... including many NOT found on Honey etc)

This super popular extension will show referrals rewards when browsing. A notification appears when rewards are available. You can also log-in your profile to see referrals from your network highlighted. Even better, you can easily add a referral to your profile directly from the extension. 

Recommendations from others will also appear - always good to know what trusted friends & others think. Give your own thumbs-up recommendation directly from the extension to influence and guide others. Your opinion matters!

* Referrals shared are checked by our HUMAN (!!) team daily. 
* The alert only appears when we have referrals or recommendations to show and is visible discretely.
* You do NOT need an account but it is much more useful if you do.
* The extension will *always* be completely FREE! 

Earn by sharing referrals & recommendations today.

We would love to hear your feedback at info@referralcodes.com
